SA15n1249:6: vidveṣiṇi viṣajvālā kiñcijjñe tu na kiñcina ||
SA15n1249:7: ihaite naiyāyikādayo vivādapadasya kṣitidharādeḥ svarūpopādānopakaraṇasaṃpradānaprayojanavibhāgapravīṇaṃ sarvajñatādiguṇaviśiṣṭaṃ puruṣaviśeṣamicchanti | yadāhuḥ
SA15n1249:12: sa ca kathaṃ sidhyatīti paryanuyuktāḥ sādhanamidamācakṣate |
SA15n1249:24: sa ca saṃkṣepato vibhajyamāno dvidhā vyavatiṣṭhate |
SA15n1249:26: satyapi cāśraye pramāṇena saṃbandhāsiddherasiddho yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ sāvayavatvāditi |
SA15n1249:28: kṣmāruhādau dharmiṇi pramāṇasamadhigate kāryatvasya sādhanasya pramāṇapratītatvāt |
SA15n1249:29: cirotpannaparvatādau ca dharmiṇi kāryatvaṃ sāvayavatvena hetunā boddhavyam | tad yathā
SA15n1249:36: nanu sāvayavatvena hetunā dravyāṇāmeva kāryatvaṃ sidhyati |
SA15n1249:40: teṣāṃ kāryaguṇāditvena hetvantareṇa kāryatvamadhigantavyam | tathā hi
SA15n1249:51: tacca śabdādiṣviva pradhvaṃsādāvapi pratyakṣeṇādhigatamiti na tāvadayamasiddho hetuḥ |
SA15n1249:53: tathā hi yo vipakṣa eva vartate sa khalu sādhyaviparyayavyāpteḥ sādhyaviruddhaṃ sādhayan viruddho'bhidhīyate |
SA15n1249:62: sarvajñapūrvakatve tu sādhye vyāptiḥ svapne'pi nopalabddhā |
SA15n1249:65: viruddhatā ca hetorasarvajñapūrvakatvenaiva kumbhādau kāryatvasya vyāpterupalabdheḥ |
SA15n1249:67: tadviśeṣasya tu sarvajñapūrvakatvasyātadviṣayasyāpi tataḥ siddhiriti sāmpratam |
SA15n1249:68: tathā hi yadyasau viśeṣo na sādhanaviṣayaḥ kathamatastatsiddhiḥ,
SA15n1249:71: ucyate | sāmānyamātravyāptāvapi antarbhāvitaviśeṣasya sāmānyasya pakṣadharmatāvaśena sādhyadharmiṇyanumānāt viśeṣaviṣayamanumānaṃ bhavatyeva |
SA15n1249:76: itarathā gotvasamavāyādiva gāvaḥ śābaleyādayaḥ parvato'pi vahnitvasamavāyād vahniḥ prasajyeta |
SA15n1249:77: astyeva girervahnitvena saṃyuktasamavāyaḥ saṃbandha iti cet |
SA15n1249:78: tarhi nāpratipadya parvatasaṃyuktaṃ vahniviśeṣamasau śakyapratipattiriti vahniviśeṣasyāpyananumānam |
SA15n1249:82: tathā hi tatrāpi nendriyakaraṇikā kācit kriyopalabdhā |
SA15n1249:85: na ca vraścanādisādhanā saṃbhavati rūpādiparicchittilakṣaṇā kriyā |
SA15n1249:86: tasmād yathā kriyātvasāmānyasya karaṇamātrādhīnatvavyāptatve pakṣadharmatāvaśādindriyalakṣaṇakaraṇaviśeṣasiddhistathehāpi satyapi kāryatvasyopādānopakaraṇasaṃpradānaprayojanajñakartṛmātravyāptatve'pi vivādādhyāsiteṣu pakṣadharmatāvaśādupādānādyabhijñasāmānyasyākṣiptaviśeṣasyaiva siddhiḥ |
SA15n1249:87: anyathā sāmānyasyāpi vyāpakābhimatasya na siddhiḥ syāt,
SA15n1249:96: tathā na dehitvaṃ kāryotpattāvupayogi kumbhakārādeva keyūrādīnāmutpattiprasaṅgāt |
SA15n1249:100: tena yadyapi buddhimatpūrvakatvamātraṃ vyāptiviṣayastathāpi tadviśeṣasya sarvajñatvasya pakṣadharmatābalāt pratilambha iti viśeṣaviṣayamanumānam |
SA15n1249:103: etena yaduktaṃ kaṇikāyāṃ yadi kulālādīnāṃ katipayopakaraṇādijñānaṃ,
SA15n1249:109: vālonmattādīnāṃ svakāryaprayojanāparijñāne'pi nirabhiprāyāṇāṃ tatra tatra pravṛttidarśanāt |
SA15n1249:110: na ca kulālādayo nidarśanam na vālādaya ityatra niyamaheturastīti tannirastam ||
SA15n1249:111: īśvarasya hi katipayātīndriyopakaraṇādijñāne tatkāraṇasya sarvatra samānatvādaśeṣopakaraṇādijñatāyā durvāratvāt |
SA15n1249:124: yadabhihitam - nityau cet kimīśvarasya jñānena cikīrṣāprayatnopayoginā,
SA15n1249:129: jñānaṃ hi yatra cikīrṣāprayatnāvanityau tatra tāvupasthāpayadupakaraṇādikamupadarśayati |
SA15n1249:130: yatra tu tau nityau tatropakaraṇādikamupadarśayadapi saphalam |
SA15n1249:132: ata eva ca so'yamīdṛśo viśeṣo vicārāsahaḥ kathaṃ pakṣadharmatābalādapi sādhyadharmiṇyupasaṃhriyata ityādirapi pralāpa eva |
SA15n1249:142: vicitrā hi puruṣamātrasya cetovṛttiḥ prāgeva viśvasya kartuḥ |
SA15n1249:145: pratyuta pituḥ putragaṇḍapāṭanavṛttirivālpaduḥkhadānena prabhūtadāruṇaduḥkhāpanayanāt karuṇātiśayameva gamayati |
SA15n1249:147: yaccedamudīritam-yadi hi sarvakāryāṇāmekaḥ kartā syāt tato'jñasya tattvānupapatteḥ sarvajñatā syāt |
SA15n1249:148: atha punarekaikaṃ kāryamekaikena kartrā janyata iti yo yajjanayati sa tatkāraṇamātrajña eva na tu sarvajña iti |
SA15n1249:149: atrocyate | kāryaliṅgāviśeṣādekaḥ kartā saditi jñānāviśeṣāt sattaikatvavat |
SA15n1249:156: ekasya karturabhāve bahūnāṃ vyāhatamanasāṃ svātantreṇa parasparavirodhena mithaḥ svānukūlābhiprāyānavabodhena yugapatkāryānutpatiḥ,
SA15n1249:162: na ca buddheranityatāyāstatra tatropalabdherīśvarabuddherapi tathātvaṃ yuktam,
SA15n1249:171: tadevamabhimatasyaiva sarvajñatālakṣaṇasya viśeṣasya siddhernaiṣa viśeṣaviruddho hetuḥ |
SA15n1249:184: nanu puruṣavyāpāramantareṇa tṛṇādīnudayamānānavalokayan lokaḥ kāryamātraṃ puruṣapūrvakamiti vyāptimeva na pratipadyata iti cet |
SA15n1249:186: tatrāpi hi vyāptipratītikāla eva vyāghrādiparyākulātidurgapradeśe vahnivyāpāramantareṇa dhūmaṃ puruṣavyāpāraṃ vinā pūrvaṃ siddhaṃ ghaṭaṃ vā vilokayan loko dhūmamātraṃ vahnipūrvakaṃ ghaṭamātraṃ vā puruṣapūervakamiti vyāptimeva na pratipadyata iti vaktuṃ śakyatvāt |
SA15n1249:188: yadyevaṃ tṛṇādāvapi puruṣasya svabhāvaviprakṛṣṭatvādapratikṣepa iti sarvaṃ samānamanyatrābhiniveśāt |
SA15n1249:190: sā ca puruṣasyādṛśyatvādasattvād vā na pratīyatām,
SA15n1249:192: sarvathā kiñcitkāryamapūrvapuruṣapūrvakamapaśyanna vyāptiṃ kāryamātrasya puruṣeṇa kaścit cetanāvānavagacchatīti cet |
SA15n1249:195: sā ca vahnerdeśaviprakṛṣṭatvādasattvād vā puruṣasya kālaviprakṛṣṭatvādasattvād vā na pratīyatām,
SA15n1249:197: sarvathā dhūmamātraṃ vahnivyāpārapūrvakamapaśyan ghaṭamātraṃ vā puruṣapūrvakamapaśyannavyāptimeva dhūmasya vahnimātreṇa ghaṭasya puruṣamātreṇa vā kaściccetanāvānadhigacchatītyapyucyamānaṃ na vaktraṃ vakrīkaroti |
SA15n1249:205: yathā dhūmādivartino vastutvādernānalādijanyatvaniścaya iti cet | na |
SA15n1249:210: kāryāntaramapyadṛṣṭopādānamupādānavat kāryatvādyupasthāpyate tathā tadeva kāryaṃ vastrādi dṛṣṭakartṛkamityadṛṣṭakartṛkamapi kāryatvāt kartṛmadvyavasthāpyate |
SA15n1249:213: tasmād yathā kāryaṃ ca syānnirupādānaṃ ceti na śakyamāśaṅkitum,
SA15n1249:214: kāryamātrasyopādānamātrādutpādasiddheḥ tathā kāryaṃ ca bhavedakartṛkaṃ ceti nāśaṅkanīyam,
SA15n1249:226: yadyādyaḥ pakṣaḥ sa kathaṃ kṣityādiṣu nāsti,
SA15n1249:229: tadāpi tādṛśī kṛtabuddhiḥ kasya nāstīti vaktavyam |
SA15n1249:233: atha tadviparītasya sādhyabuddhirna bhavatīti kṛtabuddhihetukatvamavanitanumahīruhādiṣu nāstīti buddhimato'numānaṃ pratikṣipyate |
SA15n1249:239: na ca kāryatvena hetunā saha mṛddhikārasya samakakṣatā |
SA15n1249:240: tasya svasādhyena dṛśyakumbhakāreṇa saha vyabhicārasya śataśo darśanāt |
SA15n1249:241: kāryatvasya tu dṛśyādṛśyasādhāraṇena buddhimanmātreṇa tadyogāditi nāyamanaikāntikaḥ |
SA15n1249:246: anityaḥ śabdo vastutve satyanupalabhyamānanityadharmatvāditi pratipakṣakṛtaṃ dharmāntaramasti |
SA15n1249:333: iha khalu buddhimatkāryamātrayoḥ sādhyasādhanayoḥ sarvopasaṃhāravatī vyāptistāvadavaśyaṃ grahītavyā |
SA15n1249:335: sā ca gṛhyamāṇā kiṃ kāraṇakāryamātrayoriva viparyayabādhakapramāṇabalād grāhyā |
SA15n1249:338: āhosvit sapakṣāsapakṣayoḥ sakṛddarśanādarśanābhyāṃ jñātavyeti catvāro vikalpāḥ |
SA15n1249:342: tathā hīdaṃ kāryatvaṃ yathā buddhimatā vyāptamiṣyate tathā deśakālasvabhāvaniyatatvenāpi,
SA15n1249:345: sa ca deśādi niyamaḥ kādācitkakāraṇasannidhiḥ sāmagrī vā buddhimatpūrvikā siddhā |
SA15n1249:346: yadi punaracetanāni cetanānadhiṣṭhitāni kāryaṃ kuryuḥ tato patra kvacanāvasthitāni janayeyuriti na deśakālasvabhāvaniyataprasavaṃ kāryamupalabhyeta |
SA15n1249:347: hetusamavadhānajanmatayā na kāryaṃ pratyekaṃ kāraṇairjanyata iti cet |
SA15n1249:351: no khalu kvacidavasthitāni daṇḍādīni vinā kumbhakāraprayatnamadṛṣṭaviśeṣavaśādeva parasparaṃ sannidhīyante |
SA15n1249:352: sannihitāni vā kāryāya prabhavantīti buddhimatā deśakālasvabhāvaniyamasya kādācitkakāraṇasannidheḥ sāmagryāśca vyāptisiddhiḥ |
SA15n1249:353: buddhimadabhāve caiṣāṃ vyāpakānāṃ nivṛttau nivartamānaṃ kāryatvaṃ buddhimatpūrvakatvena vyāpyata iti pratibandhasiddhaye vyāpakānupalambhatrayamupanyastam |
SA15n1249:354: tathā ca na kāryaṃ buddhimatparityāgāt ahetukameva bhavatīti saṃbhāvyam,
SA15n1249:360: tathā buddhimantamantareṇācetanena karaṇe sarvadā kriyāyā avirāmaprasaṅgaścetyapi viparyayabādhakamatiprasaṅgacatuṣṭayaṃ vyāptiprasādhakamiti kāryatvasya hetupūrvakatvamiva buddhimatpūrvakatvamapyavāryamiti cet |
SA15n1249:361: atrocyate | sidhyatyevedaṃ manorājyaṃ yadi deśakālasvabhāvaniyamasya kādācitkakāraṇasannidheḥ sāmagryāśca buddhimatpūrvakatvena vyāptiḥ sidhyati |
SA15n1249:364: pratiniyatadeśakālaśaktinā''cetanenāpi sāmagrīlakṣaṇakāraṇaviśeṣeṇa kriyamāṇāni deśakālasvabhāvaniyamakādācitkakāraṇasannidhisāmagrīkāryatvāni yujyanta iti sandigdhāsiddhā vyāpakānupalabdhayaḥ ||
SA15n1249:369: sāmagrī ca buddhimatpūrvikā dṛṣṭā ityaparopi deśakālasvabhāvaniyamādistathaiveti cet |
SA15n1249:370: yadyevaṃ ghaṭādikamapi kāryaṃ bahuśo buddhimatpūrvakamupalabdhamiti sarvameva kāryaṃ tathāstu,
SA15n1249:373: ghaṭāderbahuśo buddhimatpūrvakatvadarśane'pi na sarvatra kāryamātrasya tathābhāvaniścayaścet |
SA15n1249:375: astu tadā pratyakṣameva sarvatra vyāptigrāhakamiti cet |
SA15n1249:378: tathā siddhe kāryakāraṇabhāve dhūmasyāhetukotpatāvanyasmādevo tpattāvanyasmādapyutpattau saṃbhāvyamānāyāṃ deśādiniyamābhāva (klṛptahetu)
SA15n1249:381: prastute tu buddhimatkāryamātrayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo nādyāpi siddhaḥ |
SA15n1249:383: na cācetanasya kartṛtve kriyāyā avirāmaprasaṅgaḥ saṅgataḥ |
SA15n1249:385: tasyāpi svahetuparamparāpratibaddhasāmarthyatvādityacetanakāraṇaviśeṣaparamparāsaṃbhāvanāyāṃ nāvaśyaṃ buddhimadākṣepa iti svamatavyālopaviklavavikrośitamātramevedaṃ na punaratra nyāyagandho'pi |
SA15n1249:389: sandigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttikatvaṃ nāma hetudoṣa eva na bhavati |
SA15n1249:391: tathā hi ya eva vipakṣe dṛṣṭo hetuḥ sa eva prameyatvādivadabhimataṃ na sādhayet |
SA15n1249:392: yastu mahatāpi prayatnena mṛgyamāṇo'sapakṣe nopalakṣitaḥ sa kathaṃ sādhyaṃ na sādhayet |
SA15n1249:394: iti tu datāvakāśā laukikamaryādātikrameṇa saṃśayapiśācī labdhaprasarā na kvacinnāstoti nāyaṃ kvacitpravarteta |
SA15n1249:406: sa sarvavyavahāreṣu saṃśayātmā kṣayaṃ vrajet || iti ||
SA15n1249:408: na hi mahatāpi prayatnena vipakṣe mṛgyamāṇasya hetoradarśanamātreṇa vyatirekaḥ sidhyati |
SA15n1249:409: tathā hi vipakṣe heturnopalabhyata ityanena tadupalambhakapramāṇanivṛttirucyate |
SA15n1249:414: yadi punaḥ pramāṇasattayā prameyasattā vyāptā syāt,
SA15n1249:422: yaccoktam - saṃśayapiśācī labdhaprasarā na kvacinnāstīti na kvacit pravarteteti |
SA15n1249:428: tathā hi arthasandeho'narthasandeho veti nāyaṃ ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ |
SA15n1249:430: anarthonmukhaḥ sandeho'nartha sandeha iti śākapārthivādivanmadhyapadalopī samāsaḥ |
SA15n1249:435: tasmāt pramāṇādivārthasaṃśayādapi prekṣāvatāṃ tatra tatra pravṛttirdurvāraiva ||
SA15n1249:436: yadapīdaṃ lapitaṃ yathādarśanaṃ śaṅkanīyaṃ nādṛṣṭapūrvamapi viśeṣasmṛtyapekṣo hi saṃśaya ityādi |
SA15n1249:442: evaṃ ca sati tādātmyatadutpattilakṣaṇapratibandhaviyogitvena sādhāraṇena dharmeṇa prameyatvadhūmatvakāryatvādīnāṃ tvanmatena sajātīyatvāt prameyatvavyabhicāradarśanameva śaṅkāmupasthāpayatīti yathādarśanamevedamāśaṅkitam |
SA15n1249:446: tadevaṃ vipakṣe'darśanamātreṇa heto'rvyatirekāsiddheḥ sandigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttikatvaṃ nāma hetudūṣaṇaṃ durvārameva |
SA15n1249:447: ata evāsyopanyāso'doṣodbhāvanaṃ nāma nigrahasthānamiti yadanenāveditaṃ tadapi sāvadyam |
SA15n1249:448: pratyutāsmin hetoḥ saddūṣaṇe parihartavye nāyaṃ hetudoṣo'to na parihartavyo'sya copanyāso'doṣodbhāvanaṃ nāma nigrahasthānamiti bruvannayameva tapasvī svamatena niranuyojyānuyogalakṣaṇena nigrahasthānena nigṛhyata iti kṛpāmarhati |
SA15n1249:455: tadā tathābhūtasādhyamantareṇāpyutpadyamāne viṭapādau kāryatvadarśanāt prameyatvādivat sādhāraṇānaikāntiko hetuḥ |
SA15n1249:462: tatra prasiddhakartṛke ghaṭādau pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ vyāptimādāya sandehapade kṣmāruhādau kāryatvamupasaṃhṛtya buddhimānanumīyate |
SA15n1249:466: na hi vyabhicāraviṣaya eva pakṣe bhavitumarhati,
SA15n1249:468: iti nyāyāt | vyabhicāraviṣayatā ca dṛśyaśarīropādherbuddhimanmātrasya tṛṇādyutpattau dṛśyānupalambhena pratikṣiptatvāt |
SA15n1249:469: tataśca kṣmādharādireva sandigdhakartṛkaḥ pakṣīkartumucitaḥ kṣmāruhādistvacetanakartṛka iti caturtho bhāvarāśirneṣṭavyaḥ |
SA15n1249:470: atha vyabhicāracamatkārāstrividhabhāvarāśivyavasthāpanārthaṃ ca viṭapādau pratyakṣāpratikṣiptena dṛśyādṛśyasādhāraṇena buddhimanmātreṇa vyaptiravagamyata iti dvitīyaḥ saṅkalpaḥ |
SA15n1249:471: tadā viṭapādau buddhimanmātrasya saṃbhāvyamānatvāt na sādhāraṇānaikāntikatāṃ brū maḥ |
SA15n1249:472: kiṃ tarhi vyāptigrahaṇakāle dṛśyādṛśyasādhāraṇasya buddhimanmātrasya sādhyasyādṛśyatayā dṛśyānupalambhena vyatirekāsiddhervyāpterabhāvāt sandigdhavyāvṛttikatvamācakṣmahe |
SA15n1249:474: yadā kumbhakāravyāpārātpūrvaṃ kumbhasya vyatirekaḥ pratyetavyastadā na sādhyābhāvakṛto ghaṭavyatirekaḥ pratyetuṃ śakyaḥ |
SA15n1249:475: yathā hi viṭapādijanmasamaye buddhimanmātrasyādṛśyatvena niṣeddhumaśakyatvāt sattāsaṃbhāvanā tathā ghaṭādāvapi vyatirekaniścayakāle buddhimanmātrasyādṛśyatvāt sattvasaṃbhāvanāyāṃ sādhyābhāvaprayuktasya sādhanābhāvasyāsiddhatvena vyāpterabhāvāt kathaṃ na sandigdhavyatireko hetuḥ |
SA15n1249:476: yathoktam - na ca yathā kāryaṃ ca syānnirupādānaṃ ceti nāśaṅkanīyam,
SA15n1249:477: tathā kāryaṃ ca bhavedakartṛkaṃ ceti nāśaṅkanīyamiti,
SA15n1249:478: tatrāpi kāryaṃ ca syānnirupādānaṃ ca bhavediti na vaktavyamiti kenaiva pratārito'si |
SA15n1249:479: yadi hyatra pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ vyāptirgṛhyate tadā kathamupādānapūrvakaṃ kāryamātra sidhyati |
SA15n1249:484: tathā hi yathāṅkurādikaṃ kāryaṃ niyatadeśakālasvabhāvatvena vyāptaṃ tathā śālitvādināpi jātibhedena vyāptamupalabdham |
SA15n1249:485: tataścānupādānapūrvakatvādvipakṣātmanaḥ śālitvādijātibhedasya vyāpakasya nivṛttau nivartamānaṃ kāryatvamupādānapūrvakatve viśrāmyat tena vyāptaṃ sidhyati |
SA15n1249:487: upādānaṃ vinā kṛtānupādānādeva kevalādekajātīyakāraṇāt tadatajjātīyakāryotpattau kāryabhedasyāhetukatvaprasaṅgāt taduktam -
SA15n1249:491: na caivaṃ kāryamātrakartṛtvamātrayorapi vyāptiprasādhakaṃ viparyaye bādhakaṃ pramāṇamasti,
SA15n1249:492: pūrvoktasya vyāpakānupalambhatrayasyāti prasaṅgacatuṣṭayasya ca prāgeva pratyākhyātatvāt |
SA15n1249:493: tasmātkāryaṃ ca syāt na ca dhīmatkartṛpūrvakamiti śaṅkāṃ kurvāṇaḥ prativādī vinā caraṇamardanādinā niṣeddhumaśakyaḥ ||
SA15n1249:494: nanu yadi dṛśyāgnidhūmasāmānyayoriva dṛśyātmanoreva kāryakāraṇasāmānyayoḥ pratyakṣānupalambhato vyāptistadā paracittānumānakṣatiḥ |
SA15n1249:495: svaparasantānasādhāraṇena dṛśyādṛśyena cinmātreṇa pratyakṣato dṛśyaviṣayād vyāptigrahaṇāyogādityapi na vācyam |
SA15n1249:496: bāhyārthasthitau hi svaparasantānasādhāraṇasya cinmātrasya svarūpeṇādṛśyatve'pi dṛśyaśarīreṇa sahaikasāmagrīpratibandhādavinirbhāgavartitvamastyeva |
SA15n1249:497: tato yathā ghaṭaviṣayaṃ pratyakṣaṃ rūpaikadeśapravṛttamapyavyabhicārāt samudāyopasthāpakam tathā dehagrāhakameva pratyakṣaṃ dehāvinirbhāgavarti svaparasantānasādhāraṇaṃ cinmātraṃ kampādervyāpakamadhigacchati |
SA15n1249:498: tadevaṃ dṛśyātmano dṛśyāvinirbhāgavartino vā padārthasya vyāvahārikapaṭupratyakṣataḥ siddhirvyāptigrahaśca,
SA15n1249:500: tasmād yadi pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ vyāptigrahastadā dṛśyenaiva dṛśyasyeti nyāyaḥ |
SA15n1249:503: kartā ced vyatirekasiddhividhurā vyāptiḥ kathaṃ sidhyati |
SA15n1249:505: tattyāge'pi tadā tṛṇādikamiti vyaktaṃ vipakṣe kṣaṇam ||
SA15n1249:507: nanu bhūyodarśanādarśanābhyāṃ pratibandhaḥ pratīyata iti tṛtīya evāsmākaṃ pakṣaḥ |
SA15n1249:508: kevalaṃ sa pratibandho na tadutpattilakṣaṇo grahītavyaḥ |
SA15n1249:512: na sapakṣāsapakṣayordarśanābhyāṃ kāryatvasya gamakatvamapi tu svābhāvikapratibandhabalāditi brū maḥ |
SA15n1249:513: sa eva tu sapakṣāsapakṣayordarśanādarśanābhyāṃ bakṣyamāṇena krameṇa pratīyata iti tadupakṣepo'pi yuktaḥ |
SA15n1249:514: tena yasyāsau svābhāvikapratibandho niyataḥ siddhaḥ sa eva gamako gamyaścetaraḥ sambandhīti yujyate |
SA15n1249:515: tathā hi dhūmādīnāṃ vahnyādibhiḥ saha sambandhaḥ svābhāviko na tu vahnyādīnāṃ dhūmādibhiḥ |
SA15n1249:518: tasmād vahnyādīnāmārdrendhanādyupādhikṛtaḥ sambandho na tu svābhāvikastato na niyataḥ |
SA15n1249:523: na cānupalabhyamāno darśanānarhatayā sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāvena sandihyamāna upādhiḥ saṃbandhasya svābhāvikatvaṃ pratibadhnātīti yuktam |
SA15n1249:526: syādetat | anyasyānyena sahākāraṇena cet svābhāvikaḥ sambandho bhavet,
SA15n1249:529: athānyaccedanyasya kāryaṃ kasmāt sarvaṃ sarvasmānna bhavati anyatvāviśeṣāt |
SA15n1249:532: tasmādanyatvāviśeṣe'pi kiñcideva kāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ ca kiñciditi |
SA15n1249:535: kimasya saṃbandhasya vyāptigrāhakaṃ pramāṇamiti cet | ucyate
SA15n1249:538: asyāyamarthaḥ kāśikākāreṇa vyākhyātaḥ - prācīnānekadarśanajanitasaṃskārasahāye carame darśane cetasi vakāsti dhūmasyāgniniyatasvabhāvatvam,
SA15n1249:542: na hyetat sarvamāpātato na pratibhātamiti purastādapi pratibhāsamānamanyathā bhavatīti ||
SA15n1249:543: trilocanena punarayamarthaḥ kathitaḥ - bhūyodarśanena bhūyodarśanasahāyena manasā tajjātīyānāṃ saṃbandho gṛhīto bhavati |
SA15n1249:549: vācaspatināpīdamuktam - abhijātamaṇibhedatattvavad bhūyodarśanajanitasaṃskārasahāyamindriyameva dhūmādīnā vahnyādibhiḥ svābhāvikasaṃbandhagrāhīti yuktamiti ||
SA15n1249:550: atrocyate | bhede sati tadutpatteranyaḥ svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ śabdāsphālanamātramevedam |
SA15n1249:552: tathā hi svābhāvikastu dhūmādīnāṃ vahnyādibhiḥ saṃbandhaḥ tadupādheranupalabhyamānatvāt |
SA15n1249:558: tataśca dhūmasyāpi hutāśena saha sambandhe syādupādhiḥ,
SA15n1249:559: na copalakṣyata iti kathamadarśanānnāstyeva yataḥ svābhāvikasaṃbandhasiddhiḥ ||
SA15n1249:561: kathaṃ dhūma ityeva pāvakasatāniyama iti cet |
SA15n1249:563: tadutpatterasvīkāre sahasraśo darśane'pi kiṃ sarvatra dhūme satyavaśyamagniḥ sambhavī na veti kadācidarthāntaramupādhimapekṣya dhūmo'pi syānnāgniriti kimatra niṣṭaṅkakāraṇam |
SA15n1249:568: ata eva tayorbādhakābhāve'pi sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāvāt śaṅkā saṃbhavatyeva |
SA15n1249:574: na cānarthasandehaḥ sarvatra va rtuṃ śakyate,
SA15n1249:576: yaccānyatvāviśeṣe'pi kiñcideva kāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ ca kiñciditi svabhāvo yathā na paryanuyojyastathaiṣa svabhāvānanuyogo'kāryakāraṇabhūtānāmapi svabhāvapratibandhe tulya eveti grāmyajanadhandhīkaraṇaṃ prativandīkaraṇamatilāghavamāviskaroti vācaspateḥ |
SA15n1249:577: tathā hi vastutvāviśeṣe'pyagnirdahati nākāśamityatra yathā nātiprasaṅgaḥ saṅgataḥ pramāṇasiddhatvādasyārthasya,
SA15n1249:578: tathā bhedāviśeṣe'pi kiñcideva kasyacitkāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ ca kiñcidityatrāpi nātiprasaṅgāvatāraḥ |
SA15n1249:591: kiṃ svato bhūtaḥ svahetuto bhūto'hetuko veti trayaḥ pakṣāḥ |
SA15n1249:594: dvitīyapakṣe tu tadutpattireva saṃbandho mukhāntareṇa svīkṛta iti na kaścidvivādaḥ |
SA15n1249:596: etena yaduktam - na sapakṣāsapakṣayordarśanādarśanābhyāṃ kāryatvasya gamakatvamapi tu svābhāvikasaṃbandhabalāditi brūmaḥ,
SA15n1249:597: sa eva tu sapakṣāsapakṣayordarśanādarśanābhyāṃ vakṣyamāṇena krameṇa pratīyata iti,
SA15n1249:600: tasya coktanyāyenāsiddhau bhūyodarśanajanitasaṃskārasahāye carame cetasi manasi vā tathābhūtaṃ niyatatvaṃ parisphuratīti sadayena vaktumaśakyatvāt |
SA15n1249:601: yacca śabdatattvamiva brāhmaṇatvamiveti dṛṣṭāntīkṛtaṃ taddvayamapyasmān pratyasiddhamiti dṛṣṭāntayitumanucitam |
SA15n1249:603: tasya hyupadeśaparamparāto māṇikyavattenāpi kaṣṭenendradhanurākārajyotirādikaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ niścitam |
SA15n1249:604: na caivaṃ svābhāvikasaṃbandhalakṣaṇaṃ tvayā svakapolaracitamapi pramāṇena niścitam |
SA15n1249:606: kiṃ ca bhavatu tāvadayamanavadhāritarūpaḥ svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ,
SA15n1249:608: tathā hi yadi prācīnānekadarśanajanitasaṃskārasahāyena caramacetasā dhūmasyāgniniyatatvaṃ grāhyaṃ tadā sapakṣāsapakṣayoḥ koṭiśaḥ pravṛttadarśanādarśanajanitasaṃskārasahāyena caramacetasā pārthivatvasyāpi lohalekhyatvaniyatatvaṃ gṛhyata iti pārthivatvādapi lohalekhyatvasiddhirastu |
SA15n1249:609: atha pārthivatvasya lohalekhyatvaniyatatvameva nāsti vajre vyābhicāradaerśanāt |
SA15n1249:618: prathame pakṣe vyabhicāro bhavatu mā vā vyabhicārādarśanādevāvyabhicāra iti niṣṇātaṃ pāṇḍityam |
SA15n1249:628: kvacit kadācit kenacid vyabhicāradarśanasāmagryāṃ satyāṃ vyabhicāradarśanāt |
SA15n1249:629: darśanasāmagryabhāve tu pratyayāntaravaikalyāt deśakālāntaravartitvād vā vyabhicārasya sa(rvaṃ)
SA15n1249:632: prakārāntareṇa vā tadutpattilakṣaṇenāvyabhicāre vyabhicārānupalambha ityubhayathāpi vyabhicāropalambhanivṛttirastu |
SA15n1249:633: tvayā tu yadavyabhicārapratipattinibandhanaṃ darśanādarśanamupavarṇitaṃ tatpārthivatvādau vyabhicārād dhūme'pi nāvyabhicāranibandhanamiti dhūmo'pi tvanmate nāśvāsabhājanamiti prasaktam |
SA15n1249:634: asmanmate tu pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāmekatra kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhau na vyabhicāraśaṅkāsaṃbhavaḥ |
SA15n1249:639: tarhi sakṛt sapakṣāsapakṣayodarśanārdanābhyāṃ vyāpterniścaya iti caturtha eva pakṣo'stu |
SA15n1249:640: tathā hi kāryatvasya buddhimanmātrapūrvakatvenānvayo ghaṭādau dṛṣṭaḥ,
SA15n1249:642: tataśca sakṛdanvayavyātireka siddhau vyāpteḥ siddhatvāt kuto'naikāntikatā |
SA15n1249:644: yadi buddhimatkāraṇakāryatvayorekatra pratibandhaḥ pramāṇapratītaḥ syāttadā ākāśādau buddhimannivṛttau kāryatvasya nivṛttiriti yuktam |
SA15n1249:645: sa ca pratibandhaḥ tādātmyaṃ tadutpattiḥ svābhāviko'nyo vā na sidhyati sādhakapramāṇābhāvādityanantaramevāveditam |
SA15n1249:655: tat kasyābhāvaprayuktaḥ kāryābhāvaḥ pratīyatāṃ yena vyatirekaḥ sidhyati ||
SA15n1249:657: yathākāśe buddhimatkāraṇanivṛttistathā kāraṇamātrasyāpi tatra nivṛttirna buddhimatkāraṇavyatirekānuvidhāyitvaṃ kāryatvasya niścetuṃ śakyate |
SA15n1249:658: tathāpi ghaṭādau kāryatvasya buddhimatānyayadarśanādākāśe'pi buddhimadabhāvaprayuktaḥ kāryatvābhāvaḥ pratīyate |
SA15n1249:664: tat ka evaṃ jānātu kiṃ buddhimadbhāve kāryatvasya bhāvo yadvā kaṭakuḍyādibhāve bhāva iti |
SA15n1249:666: na ca pratibandhasādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ svapne'pyastīti caturtho'pi pakṣaḥ kṣataḥ |
SA15n1249:667: tadevaṃ buddhimatkāryamātrayorvyāpterasiddhāvadhikaraṇasiddhānta nyāyādyupādānādyabhijñaḥ sarvajñaḥ puruṣaviśeṣaḥ sidhyatīti pratyāśā durāśaiva ||
SA15n1249:668: yacca kriyāsāmānyasya pakṣadharmatāvaśāccakṣurlakṣaṇakaraṇaviśeṣasiddhiriti dṛṣṭānto darśitaḥ so'pi sādhyā(bhi)nnaḥ |
SA15n1249:669: tatra hi rūpajñānānyathānupapattyā siddhasya kāraṇāntarasyaiva cakṣurindriyamiti nāmakaraṇāt |
SA15n1249:674: tathaiva yadi tvayāpi buddhimatsāmānyāśrayamātrasya puruṣaviśeṣaḥ iti nāma kriyate,
SA15n1249:676: paramārthato buddhimatsāmānyāśraye sarvajñatvādiviśeṣaścakṣurādiviśeṣavat sidhyatīti tatra vivadāmahe |
SA15n1249:685: yadetanmerumandaramedinīghaṭapaṭādisādhāraṇaṃ kāryamātraṃ sādhanamupanyastam yāvadasya buddhimadanvayavyatirekānuvidhānamekatra nāvadhāryate tāvad gamakatvamayuktam |
SA15n1249:686: na ca tat svapne'pi pratyetuṃ śakyam |
SA15n1249:687: tathā hi kumbhakāravyāpāre sati mṛtpiṇḍād ghaṭalakṣaṇaṃ kāryamupalabhyatāṃ nāma |
SA15n1249:688: na tu vyāpārāt pūrvaṃ ghaṭavatkāryamātrasya vyatirekaḥ pratyetuṃ śakyaḥ,
SA15n1249:690: na ca yadvinābhūtaṃ yadupalabhyate tattasya kāryamatiprasaṅgāt |
SA15n1249:692: kriyatāṃ buddhimadvyatireke kāryamātravyatirekastvekatrāpi pratipādyatāṃ yena vyāptisiddhau tṛṇādiriva śoṣabhaṅgāderapi buddhimadanumānaṃ syāt |
SA15n1249:694: buddhimatpūrvakatvasyeva kāraṇamātrapūrvakatvasyāpi tatra saṃbhavāt kiṃprayuktaḥ kāryatvābhāva ityaparijñānāt ||
SA15n1249:695: etena yaduktam - na vyabhicāropalambhātprātisvikaviśeṣaparityāgena ghaṭādīnāmabhūtvābhavanādanyarūpaṃ viśeṣamupalakṣayāmo yanniṣṭhaṃ puruṣapūrvakatvaṃ vyavasthāpayāma iti tadapi prativyūḍham |
SA15n1249:696: kumbhakārādyabhāve'pi mṛtpiṇḍādau śoṣabhaṅgādikāryadarśanādabhūtvā bhāvalakṣaṇasya kāryamātrasya vyatirekāsiddhervyāpterabhāvāt ||
SA15n1249:697: nanu yadi kāryatvamātrasya na buddhimatā pratyakṣato vyāptigrahaḥ vyatirekābhāvāt,
SA15n1249:698: tvayāpi tarhi kathaṃ kṛtakatvasyānityatvena vyāptiravadhāryata iti cet |
SA15n1249:701: na ca tvayā viparyayabādhakapramāṇamabhidhātuṃ śakyata iti prāgeva pratipāditam |
SA15n1249:714: yaddṛṣṭerakriyādarśino'pi kṝtabuddhirutpadyate tatkāryaṃ sakalaprāsādādyanugataṃ bhūdharādivyāvṛttaṃ viśiṣṭamityabhidhīyate |
SA15n1249:717: tathā cāha śaṅkaraḥ - kṛtabuddhiḥ kiṃ sādhyabuddhiḥ kiṃ vā sādhanabuddhiḥ |
SA15n1249:725: vācaspatiḥ punaratrāha - idamatra nipuṇataraṃ nirūpayatu bhavān kiṃ buddhimadanvayavyatirekānuvidhānaṃ viśeṣaḥ |
SA15n1249:732: ya eva hi ghaṭo'nena buddhimadanvayavyatirekānuvidhāyī dṛṣṭaḥ,
SA15n1249:733: sa eva kāryo na tu vipaṇivartī |
SA15n1249:735: hantotpattimadghaṭādi buddhimadanvayavyatirekānuvidhāyīti anyadapitanubhuvanādikaṃ tathā bhavanna daṇḍena parāṇudyate ghaṭajātīyamutpattimadbuddhimatpūrvakamiti cet |
SA15n1249:740: tat kiṃ kāryajātīyaṃ prāsādādi buddhimaddhetukaṃ na dṛṣṭam yenotpattimattanubhuvanādi tathā na syāt |
SA15n1249:757: sandigdhavyatirekitvaṃ naiyāyikānāṃ niranuyojyānuyogo bauddhānāmadoṣodbhāvanaṃ nigrahasthānamiti tu pratipāditam |
SA15n1249:763: yadi sādhyadṛṣṭāntayorvaidharmyamātrāt sādhyāsiddhiḥ nirvṛttedānīmanumānavārtāpi nikuñjamahānasayorapi dhūmavattve'pi kathañcid vaidharmyopapatteriti sakalaṃ yatkiñcidetaditi |
SA15n1249:765: yattāvat kāryatvamātraṃ tadevoktena krameṇa pratibandhasiddherbhūdharādiṣu dṛṣṭaṃ puruṣamanumāpayatītyasmākamabhimatasādhyamasiddhirupapannaiveti kimasmākamadhikacintayetyaṅgīkṛtyāpyuktaṃ viśiṣṭakāryatvam |
SA15n1249:766: tadeva tu nāstīti punarvistareṇa pratipāditamiti tadapi sarvamanavadheyameva |
SA15n1249:768: yacca viśiṣṭakāryatvaṃ vikalpya dūṣitaṃ tasyāsmābhiranabhyupagatatvāt taddūṣaṇāya prabandhaḥ prayāsaikaphalaḥ |
SA15n1249:773: tatra yadi nāma paṭasya prāsādādibhiḥ saha vastutvasaṃsthānaviśeṣayogitvakāryatvādibhirdharmaiḥ sajātīyatvamasti tathāpi na tān dharmān buddhimatpūrvakānadhigacchati vyāvahārikaṃ pratyakṣam,
SA15n1249:776: kiṃ tu yasyaiva ghaṭajātīya kāryaṃcakrasya vyatirekasiddhistasya buddhimadvyāptatvaṃ pratyakṣataḥ sidhyatītyuktam |
SA15n1249:778: yadā tu prāsādajātīyakamapi buddhimaddhetukamekatra pṛthagavadhāryate tadā tajjātīyādapi buddhimatsiddhiḥ |
SA15n1249:779: evaṃ tattajjātīyasarābodañcanaśakaṭapaṭakeyūraprabhṛteḥ kāryacakrād buddhimatpūrvakatvena pṛthak pṛthagavadhāritād buddhimadanumānamanavadyam |
SA15n1249:783: iti | evaṃ ghaṭapaṭaparvatādīnāṃ kāryatvavastutvādibhirdharmaiḥ sajātīyatve'pi avāntaraṃ ghaṭapaṭaparvatatvādijātibhedamādāya lokasya vyāptigrāhakaṃ pratyakṣaṃ pravartataṃ iti darśayituṃ saṃvyavahārapragalbhapuruṣabuddhyapekṣayā yaddarśanādakriyādarśino'pi kṛtabuddhirbhavatītyuktam |
SA15n1249:785: tathā hi śāstrasaṃskārarahitasya vyavahārapragalbhasya puruṣasya devakulajātīyakaṃ puruṣapūrvakatayāvadhāritavato nagarādvanaṃ praviṣṭasya parvatadevakulayordarśane tayordvayorapyakriyādarśino'pi devakule kṛtabuddhirbhavati na parvate |
SA15n1249:786: tadanayordevakulaparvatayoḥ kāryatvādinā ekajātitve'pi kṛtabuddhibhāvābhāvau na tayoḥ parvatadevakulatvalakṣaṇāvāntarajātibhedamanavasthāpya sthātuṃ prabhavataḥ |
SA15n1249:787: jātibhede ca siddhe devakulajātīye vyāptergrahaṇāt na parvatajātīyasya,
SA15n1249:788: na ca prāsādajātīyasya vyāptisiddhiriti na tato buddhimadanumānam |
SA15n1249:789: yadā tu prāsādasyāpi pṛthag vyāptigrahaḥ tadā tajjātīyādapi buddhimadanumānamastu |
SA15n1249:790: na kṣitidharādijātīyasya svapne'pi vyāptigrahaḥ krīḍāparvatādernāmamātrābhede'pi parvatādibhirekāntato bhinnasvarūpatvāt |
SA15n1249:793: yaccātroktaṃ sādhyabuddhirapi yadi gṛhītavyāptikasya sā bhavatyeva |
SA15n1249:797: kevalaṃ gṛhītavyāptikosmin viṣaye na saṃbhavatīti brūmaḥ |
SA15n1249:801: yadapyatra nipuṇammanyena vācaspatinā kathitaṃ tat kiṃ kāryajātīyaṃ prāsādādi buddhimaddhetukaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ yenotpattimattanubhuvanādi tathā na syāt,
SA15n1249:804: tathā hi bhavatu prāsādaparvatādīnāṃ kāryatvādinā sajātīyatvam |
SA15n1249:805: tattu na vyāvahārikapratyakṣeṇa buddhimadvyāptaṃ pratyetuṃ śakyam,
SA15n1249:809: avāntaraṃ tu ghaṭaprāsādādisādhāraṇaṃ kāryatvamātramasmābhirapi na svīkṛtameva |
SA15n1249:812: nanu vādinā sādhane samupanyaste taddūṣaṇopanyāsamapāsya sādhyasvarūpavikalpanaṃ nāma naiyāyikamate niranuyojyānuyogaḥ,
SA15n1249:815: tathā hi sādhyasvarūpe'pariniṣṭhite tadanusāriṇī pakṣasapakṣavipakṣavyavasthā kutaḥ |
SA15n1249:816: tadasiddhau cāsiddhatādayo doṣāḥ pakṣadharmatādayaśca guṇā na vyavasthitā ityuktam |
SA15n1249:817: nedānīṃ hetordoṣa guṇakatheti mūkena prativādinā sthātavyam |
SA15n1249:818: tasmāddhetudoṣopanyāsāyaiveyaṃ sādhyaniruktirityayameva vādī svamate niranuyojyānuyogadūṣaṇena nigrahasthānena nigṛhyata iti kimatra nirbandhena |
SA15n1249:819: yadetat kāryatvaṃ sādhanaṃ kimanena viśvasya buddhimanmātrapūrvakatvaṃ sādhyate |
SA15n1249:823: nanu sāmānyena vyāptau pratītāyāmapi pakṣadharmatābalād viśeṣasiddhiḥ |
SA15n1249:831: yena hi vinā pakṣasthaṃ sādhanaṃ nopapadyate sa viśeṣaḥ sidhyatu |
SA15n1249:833: na ca girīṇāṃ tarūṇāṃ kāryatvaṃ karturekatvavibhutvasarvajñatvādikamantareṇa nopapadyate,
SA15n1249:844: evaṃ bhūte buddhimati sādhye kutaḥ siddhasādhanam |
SA15n1249:853: evamataḥ sādhanādupādānādyabhijñakartṛmātraṃ prasādhya tasya sarvajñatvasādhanāya vācaspatireva punarapīdamāha - bhavatu tāvadupādānādyabhijñakartṛmātrasiddhiḥ |
SA15n1249:860: no khalu paramāṇubhedān kṣetrajñasamavāyinaśca karmāśayabhedānaparimeyānanyaḥ śakto jñātumṛte tādṛgīśvarāditi |
SA15n1249:861: atrocyate | yāvanti dvayaṇukāni bhinnadeśakālasvabhāvāni kāryāṇi santi teṣu sarveṣveva kimeka eva buddhimān vyāpriyate |
SA15n1249:863: yadvā svasvaviṣayamātropādānādivedinaḥ parasparavyāpārānabhijñā bhinnadeśakālasvabhāvāḥ pratidvayaṇukamanya eva buddhimanto vyāpriyante iti trayaḥ pakṣāḥ |
SA15n1249:868: saditi liṅgāviśeṣāditi tu dṛṣṭānto'smān pratyasiddha eva,
SA15n1249:869: tasmād yathā mayā nānātvasādhanāya pramāṇaṃ vaktavyaṃ tathā tvayāpyekatvasādhanāya sādhanamabhidhānīyam |
SA15n1249:872: yadapyuktam - ekatve tu na pramāṇāntaramanveṣṭavyamekasya karturabhāve bahūnāṃ vyāhatamanasāmityādi |
SA15n1249:874: bahubhiḥ karaṇe yugapatkāryānutpattiriti kiṃ bhinnadeśakālānāṃ kāryāṇāmanutpattirvivakṣitā |
SA15n1249:877: tatra ekasminnapi kārye bahubhiḥ karaṇe utpattivirodhi (naṃ)
SA15n1249:883: ye tvanantadeśakālasvabhāvabhedabhinnāsteṣu sutarāmevānekavyāpāraniṣedho'sambhavīti dvitīyopi pakṣo vyudastaḥ |
SA15n1249:892: tṛtīyastu pakṣo yadi bhaved tadā svasvavyāpāraviṣayamātropādānādyabhijñatve'pi naikaḥ kaścit sarvajñaḥ sidhyati |
SA15n1249:893: na ca jñānaṃ sattāmātreṇa katipayātīndriyadarśanavat sarvārthagrahaṇaṃ yena tadabhedāt prastutaparamāṇūvat sarvasyaivāviśeṣeṇa grahaṇāt sarvajñatā syāt |
SA15n1249:894: anumānato hi katipayātīndriyadarśane siddhe'pīśvarasya tatkāraṇayogitvaṃ niścīyate |
SA15n1249:895: na tu jñānasattāmātreṇa prakārāntareṇeti niścaya iti kutaḥ sarvajñatā |
SA15n1249:896: nanvatīndriyaṃ paramāṇvādikaṃ jānato na kathaṃ sārvajñyamiti cet |
SA15n1249:899: hanta yadi nāma nyāyavihastena tvayā īdṛśo hastasamāracitaḥ sarvajñaḥ paribhāvitastathāpyanyeṣāmapāradūradeśakālavartināṃ dvayaṇukādīnāmupādānādiṣu januṣāndhaprakhyasya paramapuruṣārthāvedino vā lokaiḥ prāmāṇikaiśca nāsya sārvajñyamanumanyate ||
SA15n1249:901: evaṃ ca karturekatvāsiddhau vyatirekyapi heturasamarthaḥ viśveṣāmekasya karturasiddhau tadupādānādyabhijñabhāvasyā siddhatvāt |
SA15n1249:902: yaśca yanmātrakāraḥ sa tanmātropādānādyabhijño bhavanna sarvajñaḥ |
SA15n1249:907: na tadapekṣayā siddhasādhyatāyā janitatvāt kevalamasiddhoddhāre'bhimate viśeṣe siddhe'pi naiyāyikasyāpi nābhimatasiddhiriti brūmaḥ ||
